item.title: Dropped kerbs unsuitable for push wheelchairs, 29th January
item.description:
Dropped kerbs unsuitable for push wheelchairs on Gipsy Hill passed side road at Graveley Court. The steep drop combined with off axis approach is very difficult for push wheelchairs to navigate safely.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gipsy Hill, Greater London

item.title: Outside no 49 Agar grove in the road, 29th January
item.description:

item.title: Constant fly tipping next to recycling bins outside Rhodes house estate, 29th January
item.description:
People keep fly-tipping next to the recycling bins in N1 7NL Rhodes house estate. Can you please install cameras or a sign to stop people doing this. It has been going on for months and months.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Provost Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Untaxed vehicles in the close and Number 11 selling cars privately currently 5 in the close which is number 11 an number 13 has just brought a trailer in which is blocking entrance and exit of other cars, 29th January
item.description:
Postcode is SE28 8QJ this is going to become a problem so please can you assist with someone coming around and getting this sorted as people can be very unreasonable sometimes it is Number 11 and 13 that are causing issues. Number 13 works during the day so a visit will need to be after 19:00 hrs Number 11 does not even live at the address and has parked this white trailer and another car here which both are untaxed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chart Hills Close, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light Not Working â€“ 5th Floor Chute Area, 29th January
item.description:

item.title: Potholes, 29th January
item.description:
The potholes that were 'repaired' late last year are all back, and getting worse. They are at various points along this stretch of road and it is impossible to avoid them due to cars parked on either side of the road.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Congress Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet
